title: Netarhat Hill Station
text: Netarhat, in Latehar district of Jharkhand, is known as the 'Queen of Chotanagpur'. Famous for sunrise and sunset views, pine forests, Magnolia Point, and Upper Ghaghri Falls.

title: Hundru Falls
text: Hundru Falls is on the Subarnarekha river, about 45 km from Ranchi. It drops from nearly 98 feet and is most beautiful after monsoon.

title: Deoghar - Baidyanath Dham
text: Deoghar is a holy town in Jharkhand, home to Baba Baidyanath Dham, one of the 12 Jyotirlingas. Pilgrims visit especially during Shravan (July–August).

title: Betla National Park
text: Betla National Park is part of Palamu Tiger Reserve. Known for sal forests, elephants, deer, and safari rides. Best time to visit is October–March.
